pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: It's a 2D game without too many fancy effects, you're probably fine if you're using a computer built in the last 5 years.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 or above
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: It's a 2D game without too many fancy effects, you're probably fine if you're using a computer built in the last 5 years.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8 or above
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or greater
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: It's a 2D game without too many fancy effects, you're probably fine if you're using a computer built in the last 5 years.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
